title: Day 339: God’s Purpose for You
description: Psalm 139:1–2,3b,5,8–10, Daniel 12:1–3, 1 John 5:1–8,11–15,20.  In addition, God’s *general will* for all of us is revealed in the Bible  In the passages for today we see what God wants for you and for everyone
itunes:title: Day 339: God’s Purpose for You
itunes:subtitle: Psalm 139:1–2,3b,5,8–10, Daniel 12:1–3, 1 John 5:1–8,11–15,20.  In addition, God’s *general will* for all of us is revealed in the Bible  In the passages for today we see what God wants for you and for everyone
itunes:summary:
Purpose in life is far more important than property or possessions. Having more to live with is no substitute for having more to live for. ‘The two greatest days of your life are the day you were born and the day you find out why’.¹
God has a specific purpose for you. In addition, God’s general will for all of us is revealed in the Bible. In the passages for today we see what God wants for you and for everyone.
itunes:author: Nicky and Pippa Gumbel
